Key.English: Information
You can only purchase one vehicle every 10 seconds
There is not enough of this item in stock
This store doesn't sell this item, nor do they wish to.
You do not have enough money to buy this item
You do not have enough room to transact that quantity of items into that inventory
You cannot sell %1 %2 to this store, as that item has a stock limit of %3
You cannot do this, as the selected inventory is simply too far away.
Insufficient %1, please try again later
Vehicle Purchase Successful
NOTICE: You cannot do that with this vehicle, as it is locked
You cannot use the item %1 in this way
You cannot use %1 of item %2. Please use a valid quantity
You cannot use %1, because you don't have one
You cannot use %1, because you are already using an item.
You cannot drop %1, because you either don't have one, or you don't have %2 of it to drop.
You cannot drop %1 of item %2. Please use a valid quantity
You cannot drop items whilst within a vehicle.
You cannot transfer %1 of item %2, because it cannot fit.
You cannot transfer %1 of item %2, because the item doesn't exist, or there's too few of them.
You cannot transfer with this object, because it does not exist.
You successfully transfered %1 %2 from %3 to %4.
You cannot drop an item so soon after your last. Please wait a few seconds.
You successfully withdrew $%1 from the ATM.
You successfully deposited $%1 into the ATM.
You failed to complete the transaction, as you have not entered a valid amount of money.
Press L to Unlock
Press E to Get in
Press Shift-E to open vehicle inventory
Press E to shop
Press E to open item pile
Press E to use the ATM
You cannot repair that vehicle, as it is locked.
You cannot repair this type of vehicle.
You cannot repair nothing. Please look at the vehicle you wish to repair, and try again.
You cannot repair that vehicle, as it is too far away.
This repair kit is too simple for this kind vehicle.
You fail to repair this object, as you were interrupted, or it went out of range.
You recall your net as it is full.
You recall your net because you were going too fast.
You recall your net because you were going into too shallow waters.
You recall your net because you are no longer at the helm.
You recall your net and empty it's contents into your boat's inventory. Netting in a total of %1 cc of fish.
You recall your net and manage to empty %1 cc of it, filling the remaining space. The remaining are released back into the ocean.
You cannot deploy a fishing net without being aboard a boat!
You cannot deploy a fish net unless you're at the helm!
You can't deploy a net on a boat you don't have the keys for!
You can't fish on land! Get some water under you!
You cannot deploy that size of net here. It's simply too shallow. Try a depth greater than %1.
Your net catches %1 cc of fish. The net has %2 cc remaining to be filled.
